name.description: Identifier used to refer to the override from other overrides.

description.description: An optional description of where the override applies, and what it's intended to fix.

area.description: The area the tile override should apply in. Defaults to NONE.

overlayIds.description: An array of overlay IDs which the override should apply to. Must be combined with an area to take effect.

underlayIds.description: An array of underlay IDs which the override should apply to. Must be combined with an area to take effect.

groundMaterial.description: Case-sensitive name of the GroundMaterial to apply to the tile. Defaults to NONE.

waterType.description: Case-sensitive name of the WaterType to apply to the tile. Defaults to NONE.

blended.description: Whether the tile's colors should blend between nearby tile colors when ground blending is enabled. Defaults to true.

blendedAsOpposite.description: Blending is applied slightly differently for overlays and underlays. Defaults to false.

shiftHue.description: Add or subtract from the tile's hue within the range defined by minHue and maxHue. Defaults to 0.

minHue.description: Tile colors with a lower hue value will be clamped to the specified min hue. Defaults to 0.

maxHue.description: Tile colors with a higher hue value will be clamped to the specified max hue. Defaults to 63.

shiftSaturation.description: Add or subtract from the tile's saturation within the range defined by minSaturation and maxSaturation. Defaults to 0.

minSaturation.description: Tile colors with a lower saturation value will be clamped to the specified min saturation. Defaults to 0.

maxSaturation.description: Tile colors with a higher saturation value will be clamped to the specified max saturation. Defaults to 7.

shiftLightness.description: Add or subtract from the tile's lightness within the range defined by minLightness and maxLightness. Defaults to 0.

minLightness.description: Tile colors with a lower lightness value will be clamped to the specified min lightness. Defaults to 0.

maxLightness.description: Tile colors with a higher lightness value will be clamped to the specified max lightness. Defaults to 127.

uvOrientation.description: The number of Jagex units to rotate the tile's texture counter-clockwise, from 0 to 2048, where 2048 is a complete rotation. Defaults to 0.

uvScale.description: A scaling factor to scale the tile's texture up by. Can be fractional. Defaults to 1.

replacements.description: An ordered map of replacement override names and one or more conditions they should apply under.

additionalProperties.description:
The name of a replacement override and one or more replacement condition expressions. If any evaluate to true, the replacement is applied.
Supported operators: !, %, *, /, +, -, <, <=, >, >=, !=, ==, &&, ||, ?.
Supported variables: h, s, l, blending, textures, season.
